summary: Stefano Garbelli is employed by a pharmaceutical company. One evening Daniela, a young independent prostitute , approaches Stefano pretending to be a nurse. They get together, but Daniela has a sinister plan.
cast: Ilaria Occhini|Margrete Robsahm|Mario Carotenuto|Pinuccia Nava|Franco Giacobini|Gianni Musy|Olimpia Cavalli|Renato Mambor|Franco Ciuchini|Aldo Berti|Franco Ressel|Armando Bandini|Mario Castellani|Consalvo Dell'Arti|Gabriella De Victor|Vera Gambacciani|Franco Moruzzi|Nino Nini|Arrigo Peri|Myriam Pisani|Gino Ravazzini|Massimo Righi|Marisa Merlini|Jimmy il Fenomeno|Alba Maiolini|Mimmo Poli|Ugo Tognazzi|Elvira Tonelli|Leopoldo Valentini|Raimondo Vianello
title: El mantenido
